message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $120 by you. Considering its quality and benefits, I would like to propose an offer of $110 for it. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can complete the transaction.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value you place on your product. I would like to counterpropose a price of $105 for the product. I hope this meets within your acceptable range.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. To further accommodate your needs, I am now proposing a price of $107 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise for both of us.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to find a middle ground. I would like to counteroffer at $106 for the product. This price is closer to my valuation and I hope we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your continued engagement, Bob. In light of your latest counteroffer, I am willing to consider a price of $106.50 for the product. This represents a slight adjustment towards your valuation while still maintaining a reasonable profit margin for me. I hope this proposal is agreeable and we can move forward with the transaction.
